job.title: Software Development Engineer III
job.industry: Computer Software,Human Resources,Information Technology and Services
job.description: brstrongDo what you love Love what you do brbrstrong At Workday we help the worlds largest organizations adapt to whats next by bringing finance HR and planning into a single enterprise cloud We work hard and were serious about what we do But we like to have fun too We put people first celebrate diversity drive innovation and do good in the communities where we live and work brbrstrongAbout the TeambrstrongAs part of the Operations Engineering organization at Workday we are the team that builds and maintains the tooling infrastructure and frameworks that enables our UI development teams to build test and deliver quality productsbrstrongAbout the Rolebrbrstrong We are looking for a Software Development Engineer to join the Test Engineering team and our growing DevOps organization You will partner with internal teams at Workday to build CICD pipelines and support automation infrastructure needs brulli Build and maintain CICD pipeline infrastructure lili Build and maintain test automation frameworks lili Participate in all phases of the delivery lifecycle including development build test automation and release lili Support automation of solutions for monitoring and reporting processes lili Participate in coordination of oncall internal support and monitoring brbrliulstrongAbout Youbrbrstrong Are you passionate about automation Do you enjoy building out infrastructure to support internal developers If this sounds like a match for you wed love to talk to you brulli 4 years experience in a Development Automation or DevOps role lili Handson experience with programming languages like Java Python or JavaScript lili Working knowledge of CI tools like Bamboo or Jenkins lili Preference for familiarity with SeleniumWebDriver or other UI automation tools lili Bonus points for experience with  emAWSememDocker K8s Lambda em or em Terraformem  brbrliul Workday is an Equal Opportunity Employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans
